name: Wine Dinner
description: An exclusive multi-course wine dinner at the stunning Red Loggia at Caliza Restaurant. Enjoy expertly paired wines with a curated culinary experience in one of Alys Beach's most iconic dining venues.
highlights: Multi-course dinner with curated wine pairings
Intimate setting at Caliza Restaurant's Red Loggia
Expert sommeliers guide each course pairing

name: Oysters + Champagne
description: Savor premium oysters paired with exquisite champagnes at Arboleda Park. Presented by Garden & Gun, this evening celebrates the finer things with a coastal twist.
highlights: Premium oyster varieties from top purveyors
Beautiful park setting in Alys Beach

name: Tapas & Tequila
description: Experience a vibrant evening of handcrafted tapas and premium tequilas at Papilio Park. This lively event pairs bold Latin-inspired flavors with top-shelf tequila and mezcal selections.
highlights: Currently the only event with tickets still available

name: Mixology Seminar
description: A hands-on mixology seminar where guests learn craft cocktail techniques from expert bartenders. Details on time and venue are still to be determined.

name: Bourbon, Beer & Butts
description: A lively evening of premium bourbons, craft beers, and smoked barbecue in Central Park. Featuring a live performance by Fireside Collective, this is one of the festival's most popular and spirited events.
highlights: Premium bourbon and craft beer selections
Presented by Chancey Architecture & Interior Design
presenter: Presented by Chancey Architecture & Interior Design

name: Grand Tasting
venue: South Charles Street to Gulf Green
description: The signature event of the 30A Wine Festival, the Grand Tasting features an extraordinary selection of wines, spirits, and culinary creations along South Charles Street and Gulf Green. The 2026 theme celebrates the flavors and culture of India and South Asia.
dressCode: Elevated cocktail attire; embrace the India/South Asia theme with colorful and elegant pieces
highlights: Sprawling tasting along South Charles Street to Gulf Green
Hundreds of wines, spirits, and culinary creations
The flagship event of the festival

name: Gospel Brunch
description: A soulful Sunday morning brunch featuring live gospel music on Gulf Green. Enjoy a Southern-inspired brunch spread with craft cocktails as uplifting performances set the tone for the festival's closing day.

name: Rosé & Croquet
description: The festival's grand finale — a garden-party-style afternoon of rosé wines and croquet on Central Park. Guests are encouraged to wear all white for this elegant closing event. A competitive croquet tournament is available as an add-on.
highlights: All-white dress code for an elegant garden party vibe
